abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include a study showing that we remember Facebook posts really well, a plan for Lenovo to make Chromebooks for schools and a look at how accurate a prominent futurist's forecasts are.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Writing Siri's Lines, and Ray Kurzweil's Future
